speaker: Mt. Aegis
lines: You arrive at the foot of Mt. Aegis in cutting wind.
Icicles hang from ruined waystones along an old road.
Ahead, routes climb through glacier and cavern toward the peak.
Your breath steams as you tighten your cloak.
A raven watches from a broken cairn.
Snow muffles sound. You choose your approach.

choices.text: Establish a base camp and survey the approaches.
Push into the Glacier Pass by nightfall.
Speak with a weathered pilgrim lingering near the cairns.
